title: Should I get a name change?
body:
To something like

WTB boyfriend

WTF bearded bf

Beard bf rubs pls

beards are everything

Or something like that? I feel like it could get the word out more and advertise my desire for a bearded bf more.

https://49.media.tumblr.com/d4371fcaecd5ea730ac87ad7660fd7a6/tumblr_mxe4wfkn1X1sh83uio1_500.gif
